item.description:
EVENT: Approximately 5 1/2 mile walk from Red Rock Bistro  in
Swampscott to the Tides Restaurant in Nahant and back.  We will walk through 3 towns of Swampscott, Lynn and Nahant. Great views and great company.  In previous years we have seen people flying kites and building sand castles. We will have lunch on the beach near the Tides restaurant. Option of buying your lunch at the Tides outdoor stand. 

Wear or bring your suit if it is warm.There is a bath house partway through the walk. Bring water, hat, sunscreen.

Trip's Coordinator: Naomi
RSVP: Suggested.
MEET: 11:00 am at the benches next to Red Rock Bistro at 141 Humphrey Street in Swampscott. Get off across from 174 Humphrey Street. Public transportation--take the 10:15 am, 442 bus from Wonderland. Swampscott train station is half mile away.
Cost: There is a $5 charge for Meetups participants and guests which can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Naomi for the details but plan to meet in front of the Red Rock Bistro

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Sixth Annual Nahant Beach Walk
